action.text: Amendment SA 3641 proposed by Senator Coburn.
Amendment SA 3641 was divided into Divisions I, II, III, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII, XIII, XIV, XV, XVI, XVII, XVIII, and XIX.
Motion to table amendment SA 3641 (Division I) agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 99.
Considered by Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 3641 (Division II) rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 51. Record Vote Number: 100.
Amendment SA 3641 (Division II) agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division III) withdrawn in Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Amendment SA 3641 (Division IV) not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 105.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division V) withdrawn in Senate.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division VI) withdrawn in Senate.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division VII) withdrawn in Senate.

Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division IX) withdrawn in Senate.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division X) withdrawn in Senate.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division XI) withdrawn in Senate.

Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division XVIII) withdrawn in Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Proposed amendment SA 3641 (Division XIX) withdrawn in Senate.
